hero.title: Les Crêtes DeVin Cosmetics: from grapes to natural skin care

intro.text: The DeVin cosmetic line presents its innovative natural formula with biological active ingredients of grape seed oil, polyphenols of the grape and flowers of vineyard made by our laboratories to meet the needs of those, seeking a natural cosmetic, does not want to give up the effectiveness of natural active extracts from mountain terroir, isolated and developed with the most advanced technologies.

section.title: Indications and benefits
section.text: Ideal for all skin types, it helps to prevent and slow down the signs of aging naturally. It gives the skin vitality and a tonic and defined appearance, giving it proper hydration. It supports skin regeneration, providing nourishing benefits and restoring the face to its natural radiance.

well.title: Take care of yourself and the surrounding nature

ingredients.title: Main active ingredients of the DeVin line

listIngredients.name: Grape seed oil
listIngredients.text: The oil of grape seeds, obtained by cold pressing process, is extracted from the seeds of the grapes, strictly without the use of chemical solvents. The seeds of grape seed contain a concentrate of antioxidant substances (such as linoleic acid and vitamin E) It can counteract the aging of the skin and protect the skin from free radicals. The seeds are also rich in active substances that have a moisturizing, smoothing and lightening action. This pool of substances helps to keep the epidermis elastic and luminous, slowing down the formation of wrinkles and repairing the signs of skin aging.

listIngredients.name: Vegetable glycerine
listIngredients.text: Organic compound in whose structure there are three groups very similar to water. Its role is to maintain proper hydration since it has the ability to retain and bind water. It has a marked wetting action, preventing peeling and skin dryness.

listIngredients.name: Organic chamomile extract (flowers)
listIngredients.text: A true wealth of nature, with soothing, emollient and protective action. It offers a shield against aggressive weather agents, for an immediate effect of well-being and comfort.

listIngredients.name: Reconstituted NMF (Natural Moisturizing Factor)
listIngredients.text: Precious moisturizing mixture composed of salts (of Magnesium, Manganese, Zinc, Calcium) linked to PCA, sugars, amino acids (including proline, amino acid fundamental for the synthesis of collagen), urea, allantoin that ensures deep and lasting hydration for even, hydrated and luminous skin. It is a skin hydro-regulation factor, naturally present in the epidermis hydrolipidic film that prevents excessive dehydration and allows to keep intact, The skin surface is elastic and flexible. It is composed of water-soluble and hygroscopic substances. It is abundantly present in the corneocytes where it performs wetting functions. However, being water soluble it is easily removable with solvents, detergents, water and sweat. Its levels also decrease due to physiological aging and excessive exposure to sunlight.

listIngredients.name: Polysaccharide
listIngredients.text: Some bacterial plant micro-organisms produce high molecular weight polysaccharides to improve their defence capacity and survival. These polysaccharides form a protective matrix against environmental aggressions. This thin film interacts with the skin surface and promotes the elimination of exogenous substances harmful and aggressive to the body such as fine dust, heavy metals, free radicals, toxins.

listIngredients.name: Seaweed
listIngredients.text: Rich in mucilages (including alginates), mineral salts, with a emollient action, moisturizing, softening, protective, ideal for dry skin.

listIngredients.name: Hyaluronic acid
listIngredients.text: The ultimate moisturizing molecule, naturally present in the skin to retain water in the tissues. Its task is to keep the skin elastic, tight and hydrated and increase its plasticity. In both low and high molecular weight form, obtained by bio-fermentation of plant material.

listIngredients.name: Hydrolyzed collagen
listIngredients.text: Protein of beauty, with structural support function and ability to trap water in tissues. It determines the taut, elastic and compact appearance of the skin. It is used in hydrolyzed form because directly bioavailable to counter atonie and prevent the formation of wrinkles.

listIngredients.name: Organic oat extract
listIngredients.text: Highly dermo-compatible, it counteracts skin aging, moisturizes and enhances natural cell regeneration. It forms a protective veil that nourishes the skin soft and velvety.

lotion.name: Visage DeVin Lotion Tonique

descrizione.testo: Acqua attiva con olio di vinaccioli e estratti da fiori biologici per un viso fresco, luminoso. Privo di alcool. Indicato per tutti i tipi di pelle. Favorisce un’azione idratante, protettiva, anti-età, riequilibrante del film idrolipidico. E’ il tocco finale della detersione quotidiana per una pelle ossigenata, uniforme e piacevolmente profumata alla pesca di vigna.

lotion.ingredienti: Contiene olio di vinaccioli, estratto di Hibiscus biologico, acqua attiva di elicriso biologico (fiori), acqua attiva di boccioli di Rosa damascena, estratto di avena biologica
lotion.istruzioni: Applicare mattino e sera tamponandolo con un batuffolo di cotone su viso, collo, decollete’ dopo detersione con il latte detergente.

parfumee.name: Cristal DeVin

descrizione.testo: Fresca, idratante e leggera. Costituita da una base d'acqua, arricchita con aromi ed essenze naturali. E' un'ottima alternativa al profumo, perchè contiene una percentuale minima di alcool. Risultando più leggera e delicata, si può vaporizzare più volte al giorno, anche in estate e durante l'esposizione al sole.
Avvolge corpo e mente con una nota iniziale fresca e agrumata, per poi sedurre con note di fiori di vigna e bianchi, cui segue un finale dai sentori di muschio e legni dolci.

parfumee.ingredienti: Contiene bergamotto, acqua, cristalli di thé, pera, mandarino, fiori di vigna e bianchi, giglio, iris, muschio bianco, legni dolci, muschio grigio.
parfumee.istruzioni: Ideale da utilizzare dopo il bagno/doccia o in qualsiasi momento della giornata, per donare morbidezza e idratazione alla pelle, lasciando una piacevole sensazione di benessere. E' UNISEX. Applicare sulle zone sensibili del corpo o sui tessuti.
